about.title: About Me
about.description:
I am passionate about web development and technology in all its forms. Trained in DAW, I enjoy creating solutions that combine functionality, design, and user experience, working with technologies such as Java, Spring MVC, JavaScript, React, and CSS.

I have had the opportunity to work on diverse projects, from WordPress integrated with Laravel backends to Vue applications, always seeking to learn and experiment with every line of code.

Currently, I am exploring .NET and Python, expanding my toolkit to tackle new challenges. Beyond software, I am interested in hardware and technological innovation, and I am motivated to apply new technologies in real projects that have a tangible impact.

My goal is to keep learning, create elegant and useful solutions, and enjoy the process of turning ideas into reality.
